name: Robo Revolt (Lunautical)
description:
A world where robots run the assembly line to create more robots. However, one becomes self conscious and in an attempt to take down the operations, there's too much for few to fight back and is forced to fight in a final stand.

Unleash as much damage you can before you're forced to surrender (via deactivation by force). In this rouge-like FPS Wave Survival game, fight against waves of enemies using a wide variety of weaponry to use against other robots. With game-play modifiers that takes place and the ability to upgrade weaponry, figure out what's best for you to take down and survive as long as possible against the onslaught of robots with the only task of taking you down.

Want to stay updated with upcoming features and current developement? Join the Discord server and be sure to check out the Trello page!!

Discord: https://discord.gg/SJUmsvyrbF
Trello: https://trello.com/b/i0oMZ6Vz/robo-revolt
